abstract: Florida case involving 2011 beating death of Florida A&M drum major Robert Champion comes to conclusion, with manslaughter and hazing convictions for last three out of fifteen defendants originally charged; episode exposed ritualized hazing within college's acclaimed band.
lead_paragraph: The last three defendants were convicted of manslaughter and hazing in the death of a Florida A&M drum major, ending a three-year-old case.

headline.main: Florida: Hazing Case Ends With Convictions of Last Defendants
headline.print_headline: Florida: Hazing Case Ends With Convictions of Last Defendants

snippet: The last three defendants were convicted of manslaughter and hazing in the death of a Florida A&M drum major, ending a three-year-old case.
